info.name: MYANIMELIST | Profile Bars Styles & Sizes
info.description:
Customise your updates and stats bar colours and heights on MAL profiles!
Compatible with other Stylish MAL Stylesheets!
Note: the styles swap completed bar and watching bar colours (green to blue, and blue to green) as I feel it makes more sense as blue in progress and green as finished.
info.additionalInfo: Soft Bars style by Tsiox @ MAL & USERSTYLES Bold Bars, Pastel Bars and Vibrant Bars styles by Steve @ MAL & USERSTYLES - Feel free to send me suggestions and requests on MAL! ^ Check out this stylesheet that moves the favourites into the left panel on your profile! Thread on MAL profile improvements since the profile update!
